comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: Catholic s should know voting for someone who is for abortions is a sin it's all about life and accepting the challenge to nurture it because all life is beautiful even the bodies in Benghazi RIP it wouldn't have happened with Trump he would have sent back up BC he means business
